meanings.definition: Taphonomists: experts who study the processes of decay and fossilization.
meanings.sent1: Taphonomists carefully observe how things change over time.
meanings.sent2: The taphonomists discovered ancient bones buried deep in the ground.
meanings.sent3: The taphonomists joked that even fossils need a good skincare routine to stay looking young.
meanings.sent4: The work of taphonomists is like unraveling the secrets of nature's time capsule.
meanings.sent5: In the world of taphonomists, every speck of dust tells a story of the past.

meanings.definition: Taphonomists: those who analyze the preservation of organisms in the fossil record.
meanings.sent1: Researchers rely on taphonomists to understand how ancient life forms are kept intact.
meanings.sent2: The taphonomists compared the fossilized remains to modern-day skeletons.
meanings.sent3: During the museum tour, the taphonomists playfully argued over which dinosaur had the best 'fossil fashion'.
meanings.sent4: The taphonomists' work is like being detectives solving mysteries written in stone.
meanings.sent5: To the taphonomists, fossils are like time capsules waiting to be opened.
